channel.title: Activity Finder on YMCA Website Services
channel.description: Recent content in Activity Finder on YMCA Website Services

item.title: Bootstrap version support for Activity Finder
item.description:
In the Carnation theme we use bootstrap v 4.6 and for this case we have a special option Bootstrap version in settings form for Activity Finder v4 (/admin/openy/settings/activity-finder)

Carnation theme uses Bootstrap v4 And when we set it to 4 then the AF4 result page looks good for the tablet screen on Carnation
